comment: He was trying to be a modern day Robin Hood!! Im sure he was using the proceeds of the looted bounty to feed the starving neighborhood children! God, everyone is so quick to jump to conclusions. That old man wouldnt have been around much longer anyhow!

      :snt3 (q / quick-02
